Class Bedroll

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.Bedroll
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Sleepable
public class Bedroll extends Item implements Sleepable
Represents a Bedroll item that allows a player to sleep and restore.

  • Method Details

    • startSleepingTurns

      public int startSleepingTurns()
      Returns the number of turns a player will sleep. Randomly between 6-10 turns.
      Specified by:
      startSleepingTurns in interface Sleepable
      Returns:
      the number of turns for sleeping

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns the actions allowed for this item. Currently only allows dropping the bedroll.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Item
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor that owns the item
      map - the map where the actor is performing the action on
